Package controller

Class SlideshowController

java.lang.Object
controller.SlideshowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LogOutController
public class SlideshowController extends Object implements LogOutController
This class is used to control the Slide show scene which allows the user to view their photos in an album
Author:
Himani Patel, Elizabeth Lam
